Name: Lunar Stay Btry Mngt
checklistText:
<size=21>LUNAR STAY BATTERY MANAGEMENT</size>

1.	Lunar battery on CDR bus with battery No. 4

Panel 16:
	CB EPS: CROSS TIE BAL LOADS - as required

Panel 14:
	EPS:
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - LUN BAT
		VOLTS ind - 31.5 to 37.2 vdc
		AMPS ind - 0 amp
		CDR BAT 3 sw - OFF/RESET; tb - bp
		CDR LUNAR BAT sw - ON; tb - CDR
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - LMP BUS
		VOLTS ind - 26.5 to 32.5 vdc
	Repeat for CDR bus.

2.	Lunar battery off CDR bus

Panel 14:
	EPS:
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - BAT 3
		VOLTS ind - 31.5 to 37.2 vdc
		AMPS ind - 0 amp
		CDR LUNAR BAT sw - OFF/RESET: tb - bp
		CDR BAT 3 sw - ON: tb - gray
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - LMP BUS
		VOLTS ind - 26.5 to 32.5 vdc
	Repeat for CDR bus.

Panel 16:
	CB EPS: CROSS TIE BAL LOADS - close

3.	Lunar battery on LMP bus with battery No. 1
	CB EPS: CROSS TIE BA LOADS - as required

Panel 14:
	EPS:
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - LUN BAT
		VOLTS ind - 31.5 to 37.2 vdc
		AMPS ind - 0 amp
		LMP BAT 2 sw - OFF/RESET: tb - bp
		LMP LUNAR BAT sw - ON: tb - LMP
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - LMP BUS
		VOLTS ind - 26.5 to 32.5 vdc
	Repeat for CDR bus.

4.	Lunar battery off LMP bus

Panel 14:
	EPS:
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - BAT 2
		VOLTS ind - 31.5 to 37.2 vdc
		AMPS ind - 0 amp
		LMP LUNAR BAT sw - OFF/RESET: tb - bp
		LMP BAT 2 sw - ON : tb - gray
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - LMP BUS
		VOLTS ind - 26.5 to 32.5 vdc
	Repeat for CDR bus.

Panel 16:
	CB EPS: CROSS TIE BAL LOADS - close

5.	Lunar battery on CDR bus alone
	CB EPS: CROSS TIE BAL LOADS - as required

Panel 14:
	EPS:
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - LUN BAT
		VOLTS ind - 31.5 to 37.2 vdc
		AMPS ind - 0 amp
		CDR BAT 3 sw - OFF/RESET: tb - bp
		CDR LUNAR BAT sw - ON: tb - bp
		CDR BAT 4 HI V sw - OFF/RESET: tb - bp
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - LMP BUS
		VOLTS ind - 26.5 to 32.5 vdc
	Repeat for CDR bus.

6.	Lunar battery off CDR bus

Panel 14:
	EPS:
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - BAT 4
		VOLTS ind - 31.5 to 37.2 vdc
		AMPS ind - 0 amp
		CDR BAT 4 HI V sw - ON: tb - gray
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - BAT 3
		VOLTS ind - 31.5 to 37.2 vdc
		AMPS ind - 0 amp
		CDR LUNAR BAT sw - OFF/RESET: tb - bp
		CDR BAT 3 sw - ON: tb - gray
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - LMP BUS
		VOLTS ind - 26.5 to 32.5 vdc
	Repeat for CDR bus.

Panel 16:
	CB EPS: CROSS TIE BAL LOADS - close

7.	Lunar battery on LMP bus alone
	CB EPS: CROSS TIE BAL LOADS - as required

Panel 14:
	EPS:
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - LUN BAT
		VOLTS ind - 31.5 to 37.2 vdc
		AMPS ind - 0 amp
		LMP BAT 2 sw - OFF/RESET: tb - bp
		LMP LUNAR BAT sw - ON: tb - LMP
		LMP BAT 1 HI V sw - OFF/RESET: tb - bp
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - LMP BUS
		VOLTS ind - 26.5 to 32.5 vdc
	Repeat for CDR bus.

8.	Lunar battery off LMP bus

Panel 14:
	EPS:
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - BAT 1
		VOLTS ind - 31.5 to 37.2 vdc
		AMPS ind - 0 amp
		LMP BAT 1 HI V sw - ON: tb - gray
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - BAT 2
		VOLTS ind - 31.5 to 37.2 vdc
		AMPS ind - 0 amp
		LMP LUNAR BAT sw - OFF/RESET: tb - bp
		LMP BAT 2 sw - ON: tb - gray
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - LMP BUS
		VOLTS ind - 26.5 to 32.5 vdc
	Repeat for CDR bus.

Panel 16:
	CB EPS: CROSS TIE BAL LOADS - close
